entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -34.1°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -38.0°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:10 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:10 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:10 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 60%
